Articles.Content:
So, hello I have been playing modded for a few months now, I have run into a few issues here an there but I have mostly been able to get past them.

1. dialogueplntxt - Or a very close iteration of that come up when I launch KSP. I am really just curious on why, it does not show up in non modded, the moment I drop in the mods it shows there. I was wondering why that is, and does it mean I have done something wrong.

 

2. The Blank Screen - Alright this one is new and I have no clue why or what happened I have tried removing things to see what is causing it and I am at the point where I have a list of mods that worked in another GameData Folder, but not in this one. SO, here is what happens, THIS IS NOT A CRASH I need to stress that, there is no crash log. the game loads, it patches, it come ups to main menu. I select the format I want to play in. It loads, then it just keeps loading. and loading. and loading. and loading. It sits at a blank screen with the loading animation in the lower right corner. I can move the mouse, I can click everywhere. When I click it turns green like it should to show the button you are clicking. The one interesting thing that happens is, it will show the RemoteTech mod popup window, that explains what to use RT for and how to change it, etc. Then when I close that, we get the blank loading screen. I am not sure why....

It is running in the 64-bit client, I am testing a fresh install with some things removed, (Visual Enhancement Wise) to see if it is a texture loading issue.

if you need any other information, obviously ask I will provide what ever I can. 

(Update: As I am about to post this, I got it to work. I removed Kopernicus and all Visual Enchantment Mods... Will try slipping Kopern Back in and see if it changes the game still would like a plausible explanation so I can self Diagnose next time more effectively)
